thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Lumentum Announces Fiscal Second Quarter 2018 Results

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Lumentum Announces Fiscal Second Quarter 2018 Results
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Lumentum Holdings Inc:
* LUMENTUM ANNOUNCES FISCAL SECOND QUARTER 2018 RESULTS * Q2 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.67 * Q2 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $3.17 * Q2 REVENUE $404.6 MILLION * SEES Q3 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.65 TO $0.80 * SEES Q3 2018 REVENUE $280 MILLION TO $305 MILLION * Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.12, REVENUE VIEW $357.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.92, REVENUE VIEW $328.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q3 2018 ‍NON-GAAP OPERATING MARGIN OF 15.5 PCT TO 18.0PCT​
* LUMENTUM HOLDINGS - INCURRED $83 MILLION ‍WRITE DOWN OF DEFERRED TAX ASSETS DUE TO LOWER CORPORATE TAX RATE ENACTED UNDER TCJA IN QUARTER Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
